column3: Ji kerema xwe re/ Kerem ke

column2: you're welcome [response to thank you / thanks]
Where is the toilet? / Where is the bathroom?
column3: Tûwalet/ serşok li ku derê ye?

column2: I need to take a shower
Where can I take a shower?
column3: Li ku derê ez dikarim serê xwe bişom?

column2: I need to make a phone call

column3: Li ku derê ez dikarim nimêj bikim

column2: Can you write that down for me?

column3: Hewara!/Ji kerema xwe alîkarîya min bike
Kêfa min ji te re tê.
Odeya bi .... nûmerê li ku ye?

column2: How long do we have to wait here?
column3: Ciqasî em mecburin li vir bisekinin?
Ez ê di demeke nêz de vegerim
Textorek lazim e ji bo min.

column2: I feel sick/ I don't feel well
I am having an allergic reaction

column3: Insulin ji bo min hewce ye.

column2: I have a fever / a temperature
My child has a sore throat/ cough
column3: Qirika zaroka min diêşe/  Zaroka min dikuxê

column2: I am a vegetarian.I don’t eat meat and fish.
